axis_supply.supply_status: CRITICAL - Post-Crusader depletion. Extended supply lines from Tripoli (800-1000+ km) via single coastal road. British naval interdiction destroys 30-40% of convoys. Fuel reserves 5-6 days (lowest of war). 5 Jan 1942 convoy (55 tanks, 20 armored cars, AT guns) enabled counter-offensive. Capture of British supply dumps at Agedabia/Benghazi critical for sustained operations.

allied_supply.supply_status: Severely strained after Battle of Agedabia (21-24 Jan). Lost 117 tanks. Defensive posture at Gazala. Fuel and ammunition resupply from Tobruk (150km) and Egypt (600km). Water critical constraint in desert operations. Division withdrawn to refit and rebuild tank strength from ~150 to ~105 operational tanks by end Q1.
